name: Princess in a fridge
description:
You a frog princess and you have been kidnapped by humans to be cooked for dinner ! Escape the fridge with your unsuspected platforming skills and use your frog soldiers to distract people and delay the dinner by all possible means.

This game was made for the Mini-jam 106 : frogs².

I am very bad with sfx so I took my sfx from bensound and mixkit so prop up to them.
